unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get ready! The film festival season is kicking into high gear! From Cannes to Kerala, the world is celebrating cinema.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get ready! The film festival season is kicking into high gear! From Cannes to Kerala, the world is celebrating cinema.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Mumbai International Film Festival is gearing up for a huge edition this November. Rumors are flying about some big Bollywood premieres, maybe even a sneaky peek at the next big Telugu blockbuster!
normalised: Word on the street is that the Mumbai International Film Festival is gearing up for a huge edition this November. Rumors are flying about some big Bollywood premieres, maybe even a sneaky peek at the next big Telugu blockbuster!

unnormalised: Speaking of Kerala, remember the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK)? Always a riot! And who can forget the post-screening biryani binges? Ah, memories!
normalised: Speaking of Kerala, remember the International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K)? Always a riot! And who can forget the post-screening biryani binges? Ah, memories!

unnormalised: This year, keep an eye out for indie films coming out of FTII Pune – they're always pushing boundaries. Plus, whisper has it that a short film shot entirely in a remote village in Rajasthan is causing major buzz. Apparently, it's a tearjerker.
normalised: This year, keep an eye out for indie films coming out of F T I I Pune – they're always pushing boundaries. Plus, whisper has it that a short film shot entirely in a remote village in Rajasthan is causing major buzz. Apparently, it's a tearjerker.

unnormalised: So, grab your popcorn (or samosas!), tune in, and get ready to discover your next favourite film! It's going to be a wild ride! Don't miss the action!
normalised: So, grab your popcorn (or samosas!), tune in, and get ready to discover your next favourite film! It's going to be a wild ride! Don't miss the action!
